keyspace: CREATE KEYSPACE IF NOT EXISTS ifttt WITH replication = { 'class': 'NetworkTopologyStrategy', 'replication_factor': '3' };

tables.tables: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ifttt.tables (internal_name TEXT, name TEXT, description TEXT, partition_keys SET<TEXT>, clustering_keys SET<TEXT>, all_columns SET<TEXT>, mappings MAP<TEXT, TEXT>, PRIMARY KEY (internal_name, name, description) );
